Hi John,

I hope you’re doing awesome.

Regarding your NuGet package for HotTowel MVC, the installation gives the following dependency errors (in all my projects where I’ve tried it out):

“Install-Package : Updating ‘Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.Client 5.2.2’ to ‘Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.Client 4.0.20710.0’ failed. Unable to find a version of ‘Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.Core’ that is compat ible with ‘Microsoft.AspNet.WebApi.Client 4.0.20710.0’.”

Is this a common problem ? Since the package hasn’t been I just wanted to reach out and see what’s up :-)

(Perhaps I should be looking at something else? I’m pretty new to MVC but a legend on webforms, so I may have missed an awesomely important message along my endeavours of course)

Cheers mate, Tobias.
